alert.note: Alert for Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 8:18PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern St. Lawrence County through 900 PM EDT... At 818 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Richville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gouverneur, De Kalb, Fowler, Rensselaer Falls, Richville, Hermon, Edwards, Pyrites, Talcville, North Russell, Fullerville, De Kalb Junction, North Gouverneur, Balmat, West Fowler, and East De Kalb. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
